nodes.bodyText: Add one more indent for constructor parameters.
Fixed this and also reverted the accidental change with the same indent issue in the constructor of JsonRowDataDeserializationSchema
Added private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L; in all the four Serializable converters.

We should still keep all the parameters for equals and hashcode method. They are used in JsonFormatFactoryTest to verify the discovered format is as expected.
The same to JsonRowDataSerializationSchema.
Keep all the parameters as we had in these (De)SerializationSchema.
Fixed a small issue in this equals method.
